alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 18 at 3:02AM MST until August 18 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall will be possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central and west central Arizona, including the following locations, Page, Grand Canyon, Vermilion Cliffs, Supai, Flagstaff, Williams, Ash Fork, Seligman, Chino Valley, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Camp Verde, and Black Canyon City. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST /Noon MDT/ this morning through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. Unpaved roads could become muddy and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
